 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעֵב‎</span> **verb** ==be hungry== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** Hiph\`il and derivatives; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rûbatu, hunger;***</u></abbr> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be roomy, voracious***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***desire vehemently***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be hungry***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Isa.9.19|Isa 9:19]]; [[Isa.44.12|Isa 44:12]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעֵ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Ps.34.11|Ps 34:11]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעַב‎</span> [[Isa.8.21|Isa 8:21]], 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְעַב‎</span> [[Jer.42.14|Jer 42:14]], etc.; — ***be hungry*** [[Isa.8.21|Isa 8:21]]; [[Gen.41.55|Gen 41:55]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; of land, = have famine), [[Jer.42.14|Jer 42:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַלֶּחֶם‎</span>), [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צמא‎</span>), [[Isa.65.13|Isa 65:13]] (\|\| ***id.***; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אכל‎</span>), [[Ps.50.12|Ps 50:12]] ***if I should be hungry*** (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Prov.6.30|Prov 6:30]]; [[Prov.19.15|Prov 19:15]]. **Hiph\`il** ***allow*** one ***to hunger***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>: ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּרְעִבֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Deut.8.3|Deut 8:3]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּאֲִכלְךָ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְעִיב נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.10.3|Prov 10:3]].
